alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Monroe, Wayne and southeastern Washtenaw Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1200 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Ypsilanti to near Milan to near Ottawa Lake. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ypsilanti around 1205 PM EDT. Belleville, Maybee and Willis around 1210 PM EDT. Carleton and Canton around 1215 PM EDT. Romulus, Monroe and Luna Pier around 1220 PM EDT. Taylor, Flat Rock and Greenfield Village around 1225 PM EDT. Detroit, Dearborn, Trenton and Grosse Ile around 1230 PM EDT. Downtown Detroit and Wyandotte around 1235 PM EDT. Belle Isle around 1240 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Newport, Melvindale, Whittaker, Gibraltar, Erie, New Boston, Woodland Beach, Stony Point, Bolles Harbor and Rockwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
